#include <iostream>
#include <map>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	vector <string> names;
	map <string, int> mp;
	string curr;
	int rounds=0;
	for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
	{
		cin>>curr;
		++mp[curr];
		if(mp[curr]>rounds)
		{
			names.push_back(curr);
			rounds++;
		}

	}

	for (int i = 1; i <= names.size(); ++i)
	{
		cout<<i<<" "<<names[i-1]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
